name: Bryce Time File
summary: Learn about .TME files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Time curves defined by the user are stored in the Accel Engine.tme. Default time curves included with the application are stored in the Def Accel Engine.tme file. Both files are located in the /​Presets/​ directory of the Bryce installation.

description: Animation file used by Bryce, a 3D modeling program; contains motion settings for the animation of a 3D model; used for storing default or user-defined custom time curves.
